entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warn when enum uses 0 for success and default value may cause logic bugs #78138
  • error CS8945 when using `InterpolatedStringHandlerArgument` with new `extension` block #78137
  • Changing signature failed in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Symbols.SymbolExtensions.EnsureVbSymbolOrNothing[ #78136
  • C# 14 Preview 3 massive errors for nested functional extensions #78135

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Start moving workspace events to fire on background threads #78134
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Move ICodeFixService back to Features layer #78132
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add generic log message to avoid lambda allocations. #78128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unused code fix methods #78133
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Fix razor analyzer loading #78116
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue #70183: adjust the plural for expression collection #78110
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Loosen casting requirements on switch expression conversion #77139
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
